TopicTitle: Looking for an old mod, cannot find it anywhere

Articles.Content:
I recently remembered seeing a mod a while back that allowed you to generate your own decals within the VAB, including custom lettering and everything. They could then be projected onto the side of your rockets. However, despite 30 minutes of searching, I can't find it anywhere.

Does anybody remember the name of this or know where I could find it?
This is the closest I know of: [NEBULA space engineering - Decals](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100984)
